
1. Compute a derivative with 3 methods
x= 1.0
h= 0.0001
g= 0.5402602314186211
exact= 0.5403023058681398
d= 4.108618378407616
g= 0.5403023049677103
d= 8.778187101806576

2. Use various step sizes
2.1 See absolute error
Forward (order 1)
x= 1.0

   and various precisions
2.3 Plot digits

1. Compute a derivative with 3 methods
x= 1.0
h= 0.0001
Forward (order 1) : g= 0.5402602314186806 , digits= 0.1367545557305499 , fcount= 2

   and various precisions

Pas optimal
x= 1.0
h= 1.4901161193847656e-08
g1= 0.5403022989630699
